verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. O <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> into thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>; Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%> have they <S%H2930>defiled<s%>; They have <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in <S%H5856>heaps<s%>.

The dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have they <S%H5414>given<s%> to be <S%H3978>food<s%> unto the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> unto the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Their <S%H1818>blood<s%> have they <S%H8210>shed<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; And there was none to bury <S%H6912>them<s%>.
We are become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>, A <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> and <S%H7047>derision<s%> to them that are round about <S%H5439>us<s%>.
How <S%H3068>long<s%>, O Jehovah? wilt thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>? Shall thy <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>?
Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3045>know<s%> thee <S%H4467>not<s%>, And upon the kingdoms that <S%H7121>call<s%> not upon thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
For they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, And laid <S%H8074>waste<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation<s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> not against us the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of our <S%H7223>forefathers<s%>: Let thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H4118>speedily<s%> <S%H6923>meet<s%> <S%H1809>us<s%>; For we are brought <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low<s%>.

Help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H430>us<s%>, O God of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, <S%H1697>for<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of thy <S%H8034>name<s%>; And <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H3722>us<s%>, and forgive our <S%H2403>sins<s%>, for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake.

Wherefore should the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, Where is their <S%H430>God<s%>? Let the <S%H5360>avenging<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> which is <S%H8210>shed<s%> Be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in our <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

Let the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1433>thee<s%>: According to the greatness of thy <S%H2220>power<s%> <S%H3498>preserve<s%> thou those that are <S%H1121>appointed<s%> to <S%H8546>death<s%>;

And <S%H7725>render<s%> unto our <S%H7934>neighbors<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%> into their <S%H2436>bosom<s%> Their <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, wherewith they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> <S%H136>thee<s%>, O Lord.

So we thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of thy <S%H4830>pasture<s%> Will give thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: We will show <S%H5608>forth<s%> thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
